426210.name: Tyran
426210.description:
Tyran

Ether - the magical substance of immense power. It was locked deep inside the planet called Tyran by the ancient gods.
Nords - the native habitants of Tyran didn't even suspect that everything would change soon. Mysterious invaders came to Tyran out of deep space in their search for the Ether. They wish to become gods themselves, and it's the Nords' destiny is to stop them...

Features:
  • Сombination of strategic genres with character development as in RPG games;
  • simple to learn, but hard to master non-casual gameplay;
  • unique character development and units control systems;
  • exciting multiplayer with different mechanics on each map;
  • classic RTS or action RPG control schemes for players to choose from;
  • can be played comfortably and effective with the gamepad;
  • two playable races with dozens of different units on each side.
426210.supported_languages:
英语*, 俄语, 乌克兰语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
